title: Jamstagr
description: Jamstagr is an online social network proposing to connect musicians who wish to play the time of one evening or create a music band. The website is currently under redesign and we are working on a new version of the service.

title: Tesla Project
description: The goal of the project was to design the interface of the Tesla dashboard. But we had a big constraint : adapting the design to a movie. So we chose « Oblivion ».

title: Cartonnages GIL
description: Cartonnages GIL is the company where I did my internship. My goal was to design POS advertising (Point Of Sale). This internship required a lot of reflection , autonomy and creativity for demanding customers.

title: Portfolio
description: A project realized for a friend who needed a new design of his protfolio. He asked me for a refine and efficient website.

title: Mia
description: The MIA project is a short film that we realized as students. It talks about a robot with an artificial intelligence which discovers the world with his friend Victor. The goal of the project was also to create a whole communication behind the film, such as designing a site to promote it.
